attributes.action: stop the closure of the Ludgate Circus Post Office, New Bridge Street, London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a really busy Post Office serving thousands of customers a week. A letter issued by Craig Tuthill, Regional Development Manager, Post Office Ltd. claims ‘changing customer habits’ for being ‘no longer [able to] sustain this branch’. The daily counter queues are long, and demand remains high for this Post Office’s services.
